name: Infinity Fruits
description:
You're Jammy. You're supposed to make the best jelly ever, for a party. But you didn't, and it's too late now. So you went search for the Infinity Fruits. You need to find them all, go back in time and make the jelly in time.

Can you make it?

Also, the game won't finish even if you kill the boss. Sorry about that. But our programmer almost had a breakdown, we need him alive.

Controls
  • WASD  to Move
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Right Click to Use fruit
  • Mouse Scroll to Change fruit 
  • F5 to Restart Game
  • Z to Slap your ass
Credits
  • Mika "Made everything that is pretty to look at. Art/Animations."
  • Alef "Made everything work (or kinda of). Programmer."
  • Gui "Moral support (kinda of)."

Made for Mini Jam 27 — Celebration

The game isn't really finished yet. But we plan on updating someday.
